title: Burn
lyrics:
Paroles de la chanson Burn par Too Close To Touch
Deep as the thoughts you left in me
I never meant to keep them in my head
I’m just the way you knew you left me
Looking at the hands that kept me back

I’ve been wasting all the ways, I
Could have brought you back
But thats okay I, yesterday
I'll care a little less

I wanna just burn
All of the lies that you didn’t believe
I wanna just burn
All of the faith that you had in me
I know we both say you’ll never save me
I think its time to leave

I wanna just burn
All of the lies that you didn’t believe
I wanna just burn

Deep in the cracks you left in me
I barely believed it keeps me safe
More than a phase I am done pretending
Why try to hide this fragile state

I’ve been wasting all the ways, I
Could have brought you back
But thats okay I, yesterday
I'll care a little less

I wanna just burn
All of the lies that you didn’t believe
I wanna just burn
All of the faith that you had in me

I know we both say you’ll never save me
I think its time to leave
I wanna just burn
All of the lies that you didn’t believe
I wanna just burn

I’ve been wasting all the ways, I
Could have brought you back
But thats okay I, yesterday
I'll care a little less

I wanna just burn
All of the lies that you didn’t believe
I wanna just burn
All of the faith that you had in me
I know we both say you’ll never save me
I think its time to leave
I wanna just burn

All of the lies that you didn’t believe
I wanna just burn
